name: com.unity.xr.arcore
description:
Provides native Google ARCore integration for use with Unity's multi-platform XR API.
Supports the following features:
-Efficient Background Rendering
-Horizontal Planes
-Depth Data
-Anchors
-Hit Testing
-Occlusion

upm.changelog: ### Fixes,- Removed an errant bit mask that was being applied to the occlusion `XRCpuImage`s.,- Fixed a bug where the list of configurations per sesssion would not clear even when the [ARCoreSessionSubsystem](xref:UnityEngine.XR.ARCore.ARCoreSessionSubsystem) was deinitialized.
